comment._content: Lynn J. Arnold (1864-1920), bank president, newspaper publisher, lawyer, judge. www.usgennet.org/usa/ny/state/his/bio/pt34.html

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Bain's copy photo bears date 9/5/13. At that time, Arnold, an ex-judge, was one of several "lay advisers" to New York Governor William Sulzer during the Sulzer impeachment crisis.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started a biography at Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lynn_John_Arnold
